title: My USB-C Pixel Earbuds can't summon the assistant if the screen is not on
content: As it says in the title. It's been a while since I used them, and now this. Before, we're talking about six to eight months, it all worked as it should. Seen someone else on reddit suggesting this is and Android 10 thing, but mine worked fine after that. Perhaps 11?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
